headline: Datadog (DDOG) Valuation Check After Recent Share Price Pullback And Long Term Return Strength
summary: Datadog overview Datadog (DDOG) has drawn fresh attention, with its observability and security platform business generating revenue of US$3.21b and net income of US$106.77m, prompting investors to reassess recent share performance and valuation. See our latest analysis for Datadog. At a share price of US$137.10, Datadog’s 30 day share price return of a 9.45% decline and 90 day share price return of a 16.46% decline contrast with a 3 year total shareholder return of 105.33%. This suggests that...

headline: Does Datadog (DDOG) Offer Value After Recent Share Price Weakness?
summary: If you are wondering whether Datadog's current share price gives you good value for its growth story, this article will help you frame that question using several valuation angles. The stock recently closed at US$137.10, with a 7 day return of a 0.3% decline, a 30 day return of a 9.5% decline, a 2.5% gain year to date, a 3.0% decline over 1 year and a 105.3% gain over 3 years, while the 5 year return stands at 29.9%. Recent news flow around Datadog has focused on its role in cloud monitoring...
